Added this column. This reflects whether treatment was initiated or not. The value "yes_phi" represents treatment initiation in the public sector

Added this column as a proxy for whether or not currently undergoing treatment. If the episode is currently active and if treatment was initiated, it can be assumed that the person is undergoing treatment in the eNikshay districts

If the value is true, the person was created by the Nikshay DSTB migration. For all other values, the person was not created by the Nikshay DSTB migration.
If value is pmdt_excel, the person was created by the PMDT excel migration. For all other values, the person was not created by the PMDT excel migration.
